title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C is a powerful and widely-used programming language known for its efficiency and versatility.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithms are fundamental to computer science and programming. They are step-by-step procedures or sets of rules used for solving a particular problem or accomplishing a specific task.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is a popular programming language that is widely used in the field of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) due to its efficiency, versatility, and extensive Standard Template Library (STL).

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic data structures are fundamental building blocks in computer science and programming.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) is a programming paradigm that allows you to model real-world entities and problems as objects, which are instances of classes.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software engineering is a discipline that involves the systematic design, development, testing, and maintenance of software applications and systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is one of the world's leading cloud computing platforms, offering a wide range of cloud services to individuals, businesses, and organizations.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) known for its reliability, scalability, and ease of use.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-solving is a crucial skill in various aspects of life, including academia, work, and everyday situations.
